Description: Rim sherd of North Ionian pottery cup, perhaps lotus bowl. Interior; reserved band at rim, glazed below, with added red band lined in white and white line at lower break; exterior: maeander squares; line below; below that a band and two lines preserved.
Curator's comments: Probably from same piece as 1924,1201.875 and 874, despite varying thickness of bands on interior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1151)
